title: Money
description: Monetary value with currency code. Represents an amount in a specific currency, supporting both positive and negative values

amount.description: Monetary amount in the smallest currency unit (e.g., cents for USD) or as a decimal (e.g., 99.99 for USD). Negative values allowed for debts/credits

currency.description: ISO 4217 alpha-3 currency code (e.g., USD, EUR, GBP)
